channel.title: Weathers, Winston on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Weathers, Winston on Chege's Blog

item.title: [Book] The New Strategy of Style
item.description: The New Strategy of Style. Weathers, Winston. Jan 1, 1978. ISBN: 978-0070686922 . I got this book from my neighbor who was a high school English teacher. It was meant to help my draft my college application essays. 5 years later, I’m still reading it.
